name: pxd-uxp-panel
description: PXD Photoshop UXP panel rebuilt with a clean bridge-driven architecture.

scripts.build:plugin: npm run build && cp -r public/* dist/ && cp manifest.json dist/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const html=fs.readFileSync('dist/index.html','utf8');if(!html.includes('uxp-polyfill')){const fixed=html.replace('</title>','</title>\n    <script src=\"./uxp-polyfill.js\"></script>');fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.html',fixed);}"
